name: GHOSTS IN SPACE
description:
What happens when an old classic gets a new twist? This game happens.

-----  -----

Cute ghosts are hauting the arcade. But dont let their apperance trick you! They want to borrow your precious life, and you (obviously) need to stop them from doing that. Good thing they haunted an arcade machine with spaceships.

-----  -----

  Randomize your spaceship and       fight the endless waves            of ghosts coming at you. 

  Use powerups to get an            advantage

  Fight a variety of enemies and     bosses

  Try to withstand increasingly     stronger waves as long as         possible

  Try to set new highscores

  Full controller support
